original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Omri which he did, and his might that he shewed, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
korean_text: 오므리가 행한 그 남은 사적과 그가 부린 권세는 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Omri
and his might that he shewed
are they not written in the book
of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
